comments.text:
Load the page in the URL, open the Web console and the Error console, reload.

The Error Console reports "Security Error: Content at about:blank may not load or link to resource:///res/html/folder.png."

The Web Console is empty.

The Web Console should report this message, since it's clearly related to a particular tab.
comments.creator: asqueella@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
Load the page in the URL, open the Web console and the Error console, reload.

comments.raw_text:
about: uris are not in the scope of our current web console work, which is entirely centered on *content* http pages and applications.

This is a good bug to have in the hopper for later though.

comments.raw_text: This is not limited to about: URLs -- the data: URL I used is just a convenient way to provide a testcase. Here's a http URL for your testing pleasure: http://fiddle.jshell.net/DwJBw/show/light/
comments.author: asqueella@gmail.com
comments.text: This is not limited to about: URLs -- the data: URL I used is just a convenient way to provide a testcase. Here's a http URL for your testing pleasure: http://fiddle.jshell.net/DwJBw/show/light/

comments.raw_text:
(In reply to comment #2)
> This is not limited to about: URLs -- the data: URL I used is just a convenient
> way to provide a testcase. Here's a http URL for your testing pleasure:
> http://fiddle.jshell.net/DwJBw/show/light/

Security Error: Content at http://fiddle.jshell.net/DwJBw/show/light/ may not load or link to resource:///res/html/folder.png.

I bet that is an error who's category is one we ignore as it appears to be coming from chrome. It may also be a problem with file:/// uris.
comments.author: bugzilla@nulltxt.se
